/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Street lamps stand sentinel along the road, their presence suggesting a warm glow that would light up the street as dusk falls. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that characterize Beijing. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
